meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Encourage</kanji> <kanji>study</kanji> <kanji>money</kanji> is money that you give to a kid to encourage him to study. That comes in the form of a <vocabulary>scholarship</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>stipend</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
